result.markdown:
::: {.question} **CAPM Cost of Capital** ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} set.seed(505) #| eval: true #| echo: false #| results: asis #| warning: false library(webexercises) mrp <- rnorm(1, mean = 8, sd = 0.01) rf <- rnorm(1, mean = 5, sd = 0.01) beta <- rnorm(1, mean = 0.9, sd = 0.2) ``` ::: Suppose the market risk premium is **7.99**% and the risk‑free interest rate is **4.99**%. ::: {.question-block}
✅ Cost of capital = rf + β × mrp = **8.92**.
::: :::
